attributes.action: stop Prince William training with the RAF and the Royal Navy after he finishes with the Household Cavalry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prince William is to serve with the RAF and the Royal Navy after he finishes with the Household Cavalry.

We believe that this would be a despicable waste of public finance as he would never be asked to use the skills learned. The money saved would be better spent buying books or medicine for public use.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
